message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly better offer, Alice. Let's see if you'll take it.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. Will you accept?
I'll give you a slightly better offer again, Alice. Let's see if you'll take it this time.
I'm getting closer to what I want, Bob. Will you meet me here?
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. I'll meet you halfway again.
